languages.text: "Не излишне ли ты самонадеян{mf||а}?" {n}Немезит кидает взгляд на стаб-револьвер в своей руке, затем на вас.{/n} "Ты передо мной, мое оружие заряжено. Кажется, эта песенка еще не допета до конца". {n}Время словно замедляется, становится тягучим. Вы видите, как окровавленная рука Немезита медленно поднимает оружие, и ваше тело реагирует само по себе...{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Не излишне ли ты самонадеян{mf||а}?" {n}Немезит кидает взгляд на стаб-револьвер в своей руке, затем на вас.{/n} "Ты передо мной, мое оружие заряжено. Кажется, эта песенка еще не допета до конца". {n}Время словно замедляется, становится тягучим. Вы видите, как окровавленная рука Немезита медленно поднимает оружие, и ваше тело реагирует само по себе...{/n}

languages.text: "Aren't you a little overconfident?" {n}Nemesite casts a glance at the stub revolver in his hand, then back at you.{/n} "You are right in front of me. My gun is loaded. I believe this tune is not quite finished yet." {n}It feels like time has become viscous and is slowing you down. You see the bloody hand of Nemesite raise the weapon, and your body reacts of its own accord...{/n}

Кажется, эта песенка еще не допета до конца". {n}Время словно замедляется, становится тягучим. Вы видите, как окровавленная рука Немезита медленно поднимает оружие, и ваше тело реагирует само по себе...{/n}

I believe this tune is not quite finished yet." {n}It feels like time has become viscous and is slowing you down. "Are you sure that I have already lost?" {n}Nemesite casts a glance at the stub revolver in his hand, then back at you.{/n} "You are in front of me, my gun is loaded. I do not think that song is finished yet." {n}It feels like the time has become viscous and is slowing you down. You see the bloody hand of Nemesite slowly raise the weapon, and your body reacts on its own accord...{/n}

languages.text: "Seid Ihr nicht einen Tick zu selbstbewusst?" {n}Nemesit blickt kurz auf den Stummelrevolver in seiner Hand und dann wieder zu dir.{/n} "Ihr steht direkt vor mir. Meine Waffe ist geladen. Ich glaube, dieses Lied ist noch nicht ganz zu Ende." {n}Es fühlt sich an, als wäre die Zeit zähflüssig geworden und würde dich nun verlangsamen. Du siehst, wie Nemesits blutige Hand die Waffe hebt, und dein Körper reagiert wie von selbst ...{/n}
languages.original_text: "Aren't you a little overconfident?" {n}Nemesite casts a glance at the stub revolver in his hand, then back at you.{/n} "You are right in front of me. My gun is loaded. I believe this tune is not quite finished yet." {n}It feels like time has become viscous and is slowing you down. You see the bloody hand of Nemesite raise the weapon, and your body reacts of its own accord...{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Seid Ihr sicher, dass ich bereits verloren habe?" {n}Nemesit blickt kurz auf den Stummelrevolver in seiner Hand und dann wieder zu dir.{/n} "Ihr steht direkt vor mir. Meine Waffe ist geladen. Ich glaube, dieses Lied ist noch nicht ganz zu Ende." {n}Es fühlt sich an, als wäre die Zeit zähflüssig geworden und würde dich nun verlangsamen. Du siehst, wie Nemesits blutige Hand die Waffe hebt, und dein Körper reagiert wie von selbst ...{/n}

languages.text: «¿No estás siendo muy arrogante?». {n}Nemesitio lanza una mirada al revólver compacto que sigue en su mano antes de volver a fijar los ojos en ti.{/n} «Estás justo delante de mí. Mi pistola está cargada. Creo que esta canción aún no ha terminado». {n}Sientes como si el tiempo se volviera viscoso, ralentizando tus movimientos. Ves que la mano ensangrentada de Nemesitio levanta el arma, y tu cuerpo reacciona por sí mismo...{/n}
languages.original_text: "Aren't you a little overconfident?" {n}Nemesite casts a glance at the stub revolver in his hand, then back at you.{/n} "You are right in front of me. My gun is loaded. I believe this tune is not quite finished yet." {n}It feels like time has become viscous and is slowing you down. You see the bloody hand of Nemesite raise the weapon, and your body reacts of its own accord...{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Estás segur{mf|o|a} de que ya he perdido?». {n}Nemesitio lanza una mirada al revólver compacto que sigue en su mano antes de volver a fijar los ojos en ti.{/n} «Estás justo delante de mí. Mi pistola está cargada. Creo que esta canción aún no ha terminado». {n}Sientes como si el tiempo se volviera viscoso, ralentizando tus movimientos. Ves que la mano ensangrentada de Nemesitio levanta el arma, y tu cuerpo reacciona por sí mismo...{/n}

languages.text: 「少し自信過剰ではない？」{n}ネメサイトは手にしたリボルバーをチラリと見て、それからこちらに視線を戻す。{/n}「お前は目の前にいる。銃には弾が入っている。この曲はまだ終わっていないではないか」{n}時間がべたりと貼り付き、動きを遅くしているように感じる。ネメサイトが血まみれの手で銃を構えるのを見て、体が勝手に反応した…{/n}
languages.original_text: "Aren't you a little overconfident?" {n}Nemesite casts a glance at the stub revolver in his hand, then back at you.{/n} "You are right in front of me. My gun is loaded. I believe this tune is not quite finished yet." {n}It feels like time has become viscous and is slowing you down. You see the bloody hand of Nemesite raise the weapon, and your body reacts of its own accord...{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「本当にもう負けだと言うのか？」{n}ネメサイトは手にしたリボルバーをチラリと見て、それからこちらに視線を戻す。{/n}「お前は目の前にいる。銃には弾が入っている。この曲はまだ終わっていないではないか」{n}時間がべたりと貼り付き、動きを遅くしているように感じる。ネメサイトが血まみれの手で銃を構えるのを見て、体が勝手に反応した…{/n}

languages.text: “你是不是有点太自以为是了？”{n}涅墨斯特看了一眼他手里的短筒左轮手枪，之后又看了你一眼。{/n}“你就站在我面前，而我的枪上了膛。我相信，这首曲子还没有彻底结束。”{n}你感觉时间本身似乎变得粘稠，你的动作也慢了下来。你看到涅墨斯特鲜血淋漓的手举起了武器，你的身体本能般地做出了反应……{/n}
languages.original_text: "Aren't you a little overconfident?" {n}Nemesite casts a glance at the stub revolver in his hand, then back at you.{/n} "You are right in front of me. My gun is loaded. I believe this tune is not quite finished yet." {n}It feels like time has become viscous and is slowing you down. You see the bloody hand of Nemesite raise the weapon, and your body reacts of its own accord...{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你就那么确定我已经输了吗？”{n}涅墨斯特看了一眼他手里的短筒左轮手枪，之后又看了你一眼。{/n}“你就站在我面前，而我的枪上了膛。我相信，这首曲子还没有彻底结束。”{n}你感觉时间本身似乎变得粘稠，你的动作也慢了下来。你看到涅墨斯特鲜血淋漓的手举起了武器，你的身体本能般地做出了反应……{/n}

languages.text: « Vous semblez pêcher par excès de confiance, {n}déclare Némésite en jetant un coup d'œil au revolver qu'il tient dans sa main avant de vous dévisager à nouveau.{/n} Je vous tiens devant moi. Avec un pistolet chargé. Je crois que notre danse est encore loin d'être achevée. » {n}Le temps semble devenir visqueux, au point de vous ralentir, mais votre corps réagit de lui-même au moment où la main ensanglantée de Némésite lève son arme...{/n}
languages.original_text: "Aren't you a little overconfident?" {n}Nemesite casts a glance at the stub revolver in his hand, then back at you.{/n} "You are right in front of me. My gun is loaded. I believe this tune is not quite finished yet." {n}It feels like time has become viscous and is slowing you down. You see the bloody hand of Nemesite raise the weapon, and your body reacts of its own accord...{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous semblez bien sûr de ma défaite, {n}déclare Némésite en jetant un coup d'œil au revolver qu'il tient dans sa main avant de vous dévisager à nouveau.{/n} Je vous tiens devant moi. Avec un pistolet chargé. Je crois que notre danse est encore loin d'être achevée. » {n}Le temps semble devenir visqueux, au point de vous ralentir, mais votre corps réagit de lui-même au moment où la main ensanglantée de Némésite lève son arme...{/n}

languages.text: "Kendine biraz fazla güvenmiyor musun?" {n}Nemezit; bakışlarını önce elindeki bodur altıpatlara, sonra da sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Tam önümde duruyorsun. Silahım dolu. Bence bu melodi henüz tam olarak sona ermedi." {n}Zamanın akışı yavaşlıyormuş gibi bir hisse kapılıyorsun. Nemezit'in kana bulanmış elinin silahı kaldırdığını görüyorsun. Bedenin, kendiliğinden tepki veriyor...{/n}
languages.original_text: "Aren't you a little overconfident?" {n}Nemesite casts a glance at the stub revolver in his hand, then back at you.{/n} "You are right in front of me. My gun is loaded. I believe this tune is not quite finished yet." {n}It feels like time has become viscous and is slowing you down. You see the bloody hand of Nemesite raise the weapon, and your body reacts of its own accord...{/n}
